name: World War I
info: We can see the Allied Powers (France, Britain, Japan, etc) vs. the Central Powers (Germany, Austria-Hungary, etc.) during these years.

name: Inter-American Conference for the Maintenance of Peace
info: Creates a number of entente's between all the countries of America.

name: World War II
info: Take notice of the alliances between the Allies (Soviet Union, China, Britain) and the Axis Powers (Germany, Italy, Japan).

name: Inter-American Treaty of Reciprocal Assistance (Rio Pact)
info: The Rio Pact began a hemispheric defense pact amongst several countries in the Americas as shown here.

name: NATO
info: NATO marks the beginning of a defense alliance between America and multiple European countries, as seen here.

name: South Asian Treaty Organization
info: Created to block Communist gains in Southeast Asia, SEATO included countries such as the United States, France, Great Britain, New Zealand, Australia, the Philippines, Thailand and Pakistan.

name: Warsaw Treaty Organization
info: The Warsaw Pact was a political and military alliance established on May 14, 1955 between the Soviet Union and several Eastern European countries. The Soviet Union formed this alliance as a counterbalance to NATO.

name: International Agreement on the Neutrality of Laos
info: Burma, Cambodia, Canada, the People's Republic of China, the Democratic Republic of Vietnam, France, India, Poland, the Republic of Vietnam, Thailand, the Soviet Union, the United Kingdom, and the United States signed a Declaration which together with the statement of neutrality by the Royal Government of Laos.

name: ECOMOG of Economic Community of West African States
info: ECOMOG was a formal arrangement for a number of separate West African armies to work together.

name: Iraq War
info: Here we can see alliances form between the US, UK, Australia, and Poland against Iraq.
